item.title: Physics I - Biology
item.author: mangini.stfn@gmail.com (Stefano Mangini)
item.description: This page exists only in Italian This is the page for the Physics I class held at the Biology Department in Spring 2021. Since course was held in Italian, change language and go to the Italian page to see and download the slides.
